meanings.definition: A system of ducts used for heating, ventilation, and air conditioning.
meanings.sent1: The ductwork in our house helps keep us warm in the winter.
meanings.sent2: The HVAC technician inspected the ductwork for any leaks.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally mistook the ductwork for a giant straw and tried to drink from it!
meanings.sent4: The ductwork snaked through the building like a hidden network of tunnels.
meanings.sent5: The shiny metal ductwork gleamed in the sunlight, reflecting the heat away.

meanings.definition: The pipes or channels that carry air throughout a building.
meanings.sent1: The ductwork in the office building distributes cool air evenly.
meanings.sent2: We had to repair the ductwork in the basement due to a blockage.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat thought the ductwork was a fun maze to explore.
meanings.sent4: The ductwork hummed softly as the air circulated through the building.
meanings.sent5: The old ductwork groaned and creaked under the strain of the increased airflow.
